org.gearvrf

Class GVRComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gearvrf.GVRHybridObject
      • org.gearvrf.GVRComponent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GVRBehavior, GVRBone, GVRCamera, GVRCameraRig, GVRCollider, GVRLightBase, GVRRenderData, GVRTransform

    public class GVRComponent
extends GVRHybridObject
    Base class for defining components to extend the scene object. Components are used to add behaviours to scene objects. A GVRSceneObject can have any number of components but only one component of each type. Usually the component type loosely corresponds to the base class of the component. For example, GVRCamera and GVRCameraRig have different component types. GVROrthographicCamera and GVRPerspectiveCamera both have the same type. All of the light classes have the same type as well.
    See Also:
    GVRSceneObject.attachComponent(GVRComponent), GVRSceneObject.getComponent(long)

        Constructor for a component that is not attached to a scene object.
        Parameters:
        gvrContext - The current GVRF context
        nativePointer - Pointer to the native object, returned by the native constructor

      • GVRComponent

        protected GVRComponent(GVRContext gvrContext,
                       long nativePointer,
                       java.util.List<GVRHybridObject.NativeCleanupHandler> cleanupHandlers)
        Special constructor, for descendants like {#link GVRCollider} that need to 'unregister' instances.
        Parameters:
        gvrContext - The current GVRF context
        nativePointer - The native pointer, returned by the native constructor
        cleanupHandlers - Cleanup handler(s). Normally, this will be a private static class constant, so that there is only one List per class. Descendants that supply a List and also have descendants that supply a List should use GVRHybridObject.CleanupHandlerListManager to maintain a Map<List<NativeCleanupHandler>, List<NativeCleanupHandler>> whose keys are descendant lists and whose values are unique concatenated lists

      • getComponent

        public GVRComponent getComponent(long type)
        Get the component of the specified class attached to the owner scene object. If the scene object that owns this component also has a component of the given type, it will be returned.
        Parameters:
        type - type of component to find. This must be a value returned by getComponentType.
        Returns:
        GVRComponent of requested type or null if none exists.
